<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/@search/{query}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches for files and folders by the query specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"query","in":"path","description":"Query string","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

None, 1 - ReadWrite, 2 - Read, 3 - Restrict, 4 - Varies, 5 - Review, 6 - Comment, 7 - FillForms, 8 - CustomFilter]","example":"1"},"Shared":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Created":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-13T17:13:31.5902727Z"},"CreatedBy":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"},"Updated":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-13T17:13:31.5902727Z"},"RootFolderType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["DEFAULT","COMMON","BUNCH","TRASH","USER","SHARE","Projects","Favorites","Recent","Templates","Privacy"],"description":"[0 -
